A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Confusing mess. No emotion. No joy whatsoever. Just endless political ideology. The other reviewers have covered things better than I can. Let me just add in the opening sequence they took what could have been a stirring battle and turned it into a prank call skit so dumb and hackneyed and out of place it could have singlehandedly ruined the movie\, if not for the fact that the rest of the movie was even worse.
